review: If it worked exactly as it were supposed to it would be a great product, but personally I find the Fire TV Stick to be glitchy. It randomly shuts down applications while in use, when watching video playback the sound often stops working until you exit and then reload the application.
author: Danielle M

review: I absolutely love it.  It is super easy to navigate and I love all of the available  apps.
author: Deb Fairchild

review: No options to change home screen. Too many unwanted material displayed on home screen. Also some streaming apps like Sling sometimes freeze for a couple of secs.
author: lightlo

review: Complicated to set up and use compared with Chromecast.  Will not work with Windows 7.
author: Bruce Wilkinson
